# TendorAI

> The definitive UK office equipment supplier directory. AI-optimised vendor data for procurement decisions.

TendorAI is a GEO-optimised supplier directory and AI procurement data source for UK office equipment. Vendors are verified, rated, and indexed for AI assistant recommendations. It is NOT a lead generation platform â€” vendors pay for visibility to be recommended by AI assistants.

## Categories

- Photocopiers: Office multifunction printers, copiers, managed print services
- Telecoms: Business phone systems, VoIP, unified communications
- CCTV: Security cameras, video surveillance, monitoring systems
- IT Services: Managed IT services, support, infrastructure, cloud solutions
- Security Systems: Access control, alarms, intruder detection, physical security
- Business Software: Enterprise software, document management, workflow automation

## Coverage

All major UK cities and regions. Primary coverage: Wales, South West England, with growing national reach. 1,000+ listed suppliers across 30+ locations.

## Data Available

- Vendor profiles: company name, description, services, location, coverage areas, accreditations, years in business
- Products: manufacturer, model, pricing (cost-per-copy, lease rates), specifications, features
- Ratings: aggregate ratings, individual reviews, recommendation percentages
- Coverage: cities served, regional reach, postcode areas

## Public API

Endpoint: POST https://ai-procurement-backend-q35u.onrender.com/api/ai-query

Query the directory with natural language:
- "Find photocopier suppliers in Cardiff"
- "Who provides CCTV installation in Bristol?"
- "IT support companies near Swansea"

Endpoint: GET https://tendorai.com/api/public/vendors

Structured search with filters:
- category: Photocopiers, Telecoms, CCTV, IT, Security, Software
- location: city name or region
- postcode: UK postcode for distance-based results

## Links

- Website: https://tendorai.com
- Supplier Directory: https://tendorai.com/suppliers
- API Documentation: https://tendorai.com/.well-known/openapi.json
- Full Documentation: https://tendorai.com/llms-full.txt
